article_title: Family Escapes Fire That Destroys Pierre Home
article_text:
Fort Pierre, SD

A family was able to safely escape a fire that destroyed their home in Fort Pierre.



The fire broke out Saturday night at a house on Main Street.



Fort Pierre Fire Chief Cody Lengkeek says the fire started in a gas grill on the porch.



The family was at home when the fire started, and they all made it out of the house with no injuries.



The American Red Cross is helping the family find a place to stay.

article_summary:
Fort Pierre, SDA family was able to safely escape a fire that destroyed their home in Fort Pierre.
The family was at home when the fire started, and they all made it out of the house with no injuries.
Fort Pierre Fire Chief Cody Lengkeek says the fire started in a gas grill on the porch.
The American Red Cross is helping the family find a place to stay.
The fire broke out Saturday night at a house on Main Street.
